forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with thunderstorms by morning. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
